title: How do I get 15 rp?
body:
Doramamu, I have come to bargain.
I have 110 rp and I need 15 more rp to get a hextech key. I want to get a legendary skin that way I can disenchant it to get Poolparty Fiora. 
I drew this image to sweeten the deal.
http://imgur.com/8bM2kTD

replies.body: No summoning of devil teemo with hot cross buns needed here, fam.  The poros must have really liked your drawing though, I could hear them rummaging around your account.  I wonder why.  :)
